name: The Chikafag and Chika
description:
The Chikafag, an amnesiac man who recently moved into the small sea side town of Uchiura, falls in love with a girl named Takami Chika he meets there. Chika falls for The Chikafag too and everything is alright in the world. ... That is, until someone decides they can't allow their relationship to develop any further.

What is this?

A visual novel created by The Chikafag starring Love Live Sunshine Characters.

What are the system requirements?

MINIMUM:

OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher
Memory: 3 GB RAM
Graphics: DirectX 10 or higher compatible graphics card / VRAM 512 MB or more (GeForce 8400 or higher, Radeon HD 2400 or higher)
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 6 GB available space 

RECOMMENDED (not really):
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Processor: Intel Core i7 7700k
Memory: 32 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia Geoforce GTX 1080 ti
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 4 TB available space

Length?

Around 8 - 10 hours


Created using Visual Novel Maker.


The filesize is more than 1GB so I didn't directly upload it here, choose between either Mega or Google Drive to download, both links contain the exact same game.
